options.name: current
options.description: Information about the currently active PUG on this guild.

options.name: join
options.description: Join the active PUG on this guild.

options.name: leave
options.description: Leave the active PUG on this guild.

options.name: create
options.description: Start a new PUG on this guild, requires Manage Server permissions.

options.name: teams
options.description: Create two random teams of registered players, with a minimum of 4 registered players.

options.name: close
options.description: Close the active PUG, requires Manage Server permissions.
